data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Zigong, Sichuan, China humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Zigong, Sichuan, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Zigong words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Zigong to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Zigong, Sichuan, China know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Ersu people.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Zigong, Sichuan, China and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Zigong, Sichuan, China.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Zigong, Sichuan, China the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

location.name: Zigong
location.people_groups_list: Nosu, Tianba, Naju, Mulao Jia, Naheng, Ergong
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Nosu, Tianba (111,000), Naju (1,900), Mulao Jia (41,000), Naheng (1,600), Ergong (64,000)
